item.description: After the crazy response (crazy, good!) to the resuming of Drop-In Classes on Saturdays, they are now being scheduled for the month of April (with the exception of April 15th, due to the Registered Pre-Walk taking place that day). These classes will concentrate of developing better breed ambassadors, great manners, fun tricks and games to improve focus, relationship AND public perception. ~~~ Cost will be $15. ~~~ Bring heavy-duty treats, 4-6 foot leash (NO flexi/extendable leashes) and a good attitude! ~~~ Hope to see you in April!
item.name: Additional CGC/Better Breed Ambassador Drop-In Classes for Month of April!
